params.drawCalculator: DrawCalculator address bound to this timelock

calculate(address,uint32[],bytes).details: Will enforce a "cooldown" period between when a Draw is pushed and when users can start to claim prizes.

claimOwnership().details: This function is only callable by the `_pendingOwner`.

params._timelockDuration: Elapsed seconds before new Draw is available.

returns._0: Seconds to pass before Draw is valid.
True if timelockDuration, since last timelock has elapsed, false otherwise.

lock(uint32).details: Restricts new draws by forcing a push timelock.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setManager(address).details: Throws if called by any account other than the owner.

returns._0: Boolean to indicate if the operation was successful or not.

setTimelockDuration(uint32).details: Set new Timelock duration and emit TimelockSet event.

Deployed(address,uint32).notice: Deployed event when the constructor is called

LockedDraw(uint32,uint32).notice: Emitted when target draw id is locked.

TimelockDurationSet(uint32).notice: Emitted event when the timelock duration is updated

TimelockSet((uint128,uint32)).notice: Emitted event when the timelock struct is updated

calculate(address,uint32[],bytes).notice: Routes claim/calculate requests between PrizeDistributor and DrawCalculator.

claimOwnership().notice: Allows the `_pendingOwner` address to finalize the transfer.

lock(uint32).notice: Lock passed draw id for `timelockDuration` seconds.

owner().notice: Returns the address of the current owner.

setTimelock((uint128,uint32)).notice: Set the Timelock struct. Only callable by the contract owner.

setTimelockDuration(uint32).notice: Set new Timelock duration. Only callable by owner

transferOwnership(address).notice: Allows current owner to set the `_pendingOwner` address.

userdoc.notice: OracleTimelock(s) acts as an intermediary between multiple V4 smart contracts. The OracleTimelock is responsible for pushing Draws to a DrawBuffer and routing claim requests from a PrizeDistributor to a DrawCalculator. The primary objective is to include a "cooldown" period for all new Draws. Allowing the correction of a maliciously set Draw in the unfortunate event an Owner is compromised.
